sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import styles from '../../ProfileBlocks.module.css'; const RequestsContent = ({ currentRequest, handleAccept, handleDecline }) => ( <>
{currentRequest.student.surname} {currentRequest.student.name} {currentRequest.student.patronymic} {currentRequest.student.group} {currentRequest.student.average_score} Тема ВКР: {currentRequest.theme_str} Тип ВКР: {currentRequest.type_of_fqw} Дополнительно: {currentRequest.additional_information} Утвердить тему ВКР
); export default RequestsContent;
